remarks: The closed subspaces of the final constructed Hilbert space.  TODO: ~ hlhilbase is applied over and over to conclusion rather than applied once to antecedent - would compressed proof be shorter if applied once to antecedent?  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhillcs.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhillcs.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhillcs.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhillcs.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` U ) $.
hlhillcs.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhillcs $p |- ( ph -> C = ran I ) $.
